Methods

clear

() Void protected

Defined in src/davinci-eight/base/EngineApp.ts:68

Sets the graphics buffers to values preselected by clearColor, clearDepth or clearStencil.

This method is a shortcut for engine.clear().

Returns:

Void:

manage

(
  • managed
)
Void

Inherited from BrowserApp: src/davinci-eight/base/BrowserApp.ts:122

Transfers ownership of the shareable object to this BrowserApp.

All managed objects will be released in the BrowserApp.destructor method.

You must not call release() on the object you are transferring.

Parameters:

  • managed Shareable

Returns:

Void:
